{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=DGN2200 |revision=v1 |upc=606449077117 |asin=B003NZSX7G |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12L146 |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=PY309200112 |fcc_date=12/08/2009 |ic_id=4054A-9200112 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358U |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640DBTC-90G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638J-LCCC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, J5,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43222 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21.5; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |default_ssid_regex=Linux;2.6.21.5 |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=30:46:9A,A0:21:B7,C0:3F:0E |oui_eth=30:46:9A,A0:21:B7,C0:3F:0E }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N 300 Modem Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=DGN2200v1|vs_id=13012}} The same hardware is used by the [[Netgear MBRN3000]] (''3G/UMTS Mobile Broadband Wireless-N Router''). The ADSL port is omitted on this model. Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, model U12L146T00 Default SSID '''NETGEARXX'''?
